title: Max Martin, Pop’s Low-Key Mastermind, Takes Center Stage (Sort Of)
description: The Swedish songwriter and producer behind smashes for Britney Spears, Katy Perry and the Weeknd is reluctantly emerging for “& Juliet,” a new Broadway show built on his music.
dc:creator: Joe Coscarelli
media:credit: Christopher Lee for The New York Times
media:description: Max Martin has been one of the primary architects of the sound of the modern Top 40.
